code.installcode: $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `". TABLE_PREFIX ."invoices_invoices` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `customerid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `invoiceid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `issued` date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', `duedate` date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', `paid` date NOT NULL default '0000-00-00', `itemname1` varchar(255) default NULL, `itemquantity1` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `itemprice1` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemnet1` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtax1` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtaxamount1` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtotal1` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemname2` varchar(255) default NULL, `itemquantity2` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `itemprice2` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemnet2` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtax2` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtaxamount2` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtotal2` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemname3` varchar(255) default NULL, `itemquantity3` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `itemprice3` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemnet3` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtax3` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtaxamount3` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtotal3` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemname4` varchar(255) default NULL, `itemquantity4` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `itemprice4` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemnet4` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtax4` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtaxamount4` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtotal4` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemname5` varchar(255) default NULL, `itemquantity5` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `itemprice5` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemnet5` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtax5` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtaxamount5` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `itemtotal5` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `subtotal` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `discount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `total` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `taxamount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `shipping` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `invoicetotal` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `terms` mediumtext, `transid` varchar(35) NOT NULL default '', `isvoid` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `sent` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `customerid` (`customerid`), KEY `invoiceid` (`invoiceid`), KEY `duedate` (`duedate`), KEY `transid` (`transid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM "); $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `". TABLE_PREFIX ."invoices_customers` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `name` varchar(150) default NULL, `address` varchar(150) default NULL, `city` varchar(50) default NULL, `state` varchar(50) default NULL, `country` varchar(50) default NULL, `zipcode` varchar(50) default NULL, `phone` varchar(50) default NULL, `vatdetails` varchar(50) default NULL, `email` varchar(100) default NULL, `terms` varchar(255) default NULL, `invoices` int(3) NOT NULL default '0', `amount` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `paid` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `unpaid` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `overdue` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `regkey` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `regkey` (`regkey`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM "); $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `".TABLE_PREFIX."invoices_payments` ( `id` varchar(35) NOT NULL default '', `script` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `function` varchar(50) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM "); $vbulletin->db->query_write(" CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `". TABLE_PREFIX ."invoices_settings` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `emailtitle1` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '', `emailbody1` mediumtext, `emailtitle2` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '', `emailbody2` mediumtext, `emailtitle3` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '', `emailbody3` mediumtext, `emailtitle4` varchar(250) NOT NULL default '', `emailbody4` mediumtext, `emailfooter` mediumtext, `invoice` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `invoicenbr` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `invoiceto` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `issued` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `duedate` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `unpaid` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `paid` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `overdue` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `item` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `quantity` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `price` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `net` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `tax` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `taxsum` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `gross` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `subtotal` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `discount` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `totalnet` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `taxamount` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `shipping` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `balancedue` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `terms` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `phone` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `email` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `vatdetails` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM "); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."usergroup ADD invoices INT( 10 ) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_company MEDIUMTEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_logo VARCHAR( 255 ) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_paypal TINYINT( 1 ) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_paypal_email VARCHAR( 255 ) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_priceformat TINYINT( 1 ) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '1' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_dateformat VARCHAR( 20 ) DEFAULT 'm/d/Y' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_charset VARCHAR( 20 ) DEFAULT 'utf-8' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_chardir VARCHAR( 20 ) DEFAULT 'ltr' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_vat DECIMAL( 5,2 ) DEFAULT '0.00' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_nextinvoice INT( 10 ) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '1' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_currency VARCHAR( 10 ) DEFAULT '$' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_currency_long VARCHAR( 10 ) DEFAULT 'USD' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_perpage INT( 5 ) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '15' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_fromname VARCHAR( 100 ) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL"); $vbulletin->db->query_write("ALTER TABLE ". TABLE_PREFIX ."user ADD inv_fromemail VARCHAR( 100 ) DEFAULT '' NOT NULL");

phrasetype.phrase: You can use the following replacement variables
